readable.title: 3532192208_64b069d05d
readable.content: A man in a room with three other people holding a large camera . A man is standing at the back of a room with a sticker on his shirt . Man with grey shirt with a white name badge . Red-headed man with " Flickr " badge at event . The man in the t-shirt , with a gold chain around his neck , is in a room with three others people .
